events.message: The insured reported a car accident that occurred last night involving a collision with another vehicle at the intersection.
Claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the insured’s description and keywords provided during filing.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to manage communication and oversee the claims process for the vehicle damage.
The insurance company has acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer of prompt assistance and processing.
Request was made for police report, photographs of vehicle damage, and repair cost estimates to support the claim evaluation.
The insured uploaded all requested documents including police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and preliminary repair bills.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence and verifying the circumstances of the vehicle collision at the site.
The investigation concluded with confirmation that the insured was not at fault and vehicle damage assessment finalized.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs based on the assessed damages and policy limits.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the timely handling of the claim.
The claim was officially approved for payment following acceptance of the settlement terms by the insured party.
A payment was issued to the insured’s bank account to cover the vehicle repair expenses as per the approved claim.
The claim was formally closed after successful payment and confirmation that repairs were underway without further issues.
All related documents and files were archived in the system for future reference in case of any warranty or follow-up queries.
